body:
### Summary
The sources of the packages py-dev have moved
### Expected Result

A successful installation of the py-dev packages

### Actual Result

Spack returns with an error from curl(1) about not being able to download the packages (404 not found, confirmed through browser access)

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install py-dev
...
```

### Information on your system

Nothing too important, as the error is not coming from my system.
-----

I was unable to find an alternative repository, so I couldn't update the file and make a pull request.
title: Sources of package py-dev cannot be found
